title: SMB Sales Specialist
content:
We're revolutionizing the fitness & wellness industry, and we’re looking for talented people to help us do it. Mindbody + ClassPass bring together the best of both sides of the market: Mindbody is the industry’s most trusted all-in-one technology platform; ClassPass is one of the most popular apps for fitness & self-care enthusiasts. Together we’re partnering with more than 70,000 fitness studios, gyms, salons, and spas around the world. We’re not just another tech company—we’re far and away the leader of our industry. So join the team, work with mission-led people, and enjoy amazing benefits. Let’s see what we can accomplish together! Who we are




This team will focus on increasing the revenue and success of our new hires, existing team members and individual portfolio of prospective customers. The team is responsible for identifying business solutions with prospects by proactively determining the customer’s needs through pitching, consulting and upselling.




About the right team member




The SMB Sales Specialist is responsible for achieving sales targets within an inside sales environment. This position is focused on the total addressable market, while maintaining revenue objectives. The position involves communicating with prospects in various forums including, outbound & inbound calls, emails, text, and other social media engagements. The SMB Sales Specialist enable others’ passions for health, wellness, and beauty to reach their maximum potential by providing solutions through technology.




About the role





Drives sales volume via outbound cold calls, lead generation, converting inbound leads and closing sales with our single location customers
Initiates sales activity via phone, text and email, including but not limited to, introduction (cold calls), follow-ups, and demonstration calls, introduction emails, follow-up emails, pre-and post- demonstration reminder and follow-up emails
Demonstrate MINDBODY software, products, and partner solutions to potential clients and assisting them in selecting the best solution(s) for their needs while working within a specific niche
Consult with prospective clients by addressing their questions and needs to identify the proper MINDBODY solution
Establish business relationships with prospective customers to generate new business
Effectively manage pipeline as well as forecasting business on a monthly and quarterly basis
Consistently achieve monthly and quarterly quota goal
Develops clear and effective written proposals/quotations for prospective clients upon request and with manager approval
Identifies advantages and key differentiators as compared to competitors within our various markets
Plans and organizes personal sales strategy as well as strategically plans daily/weekly/monthly schedule to maximize return on time investment
Keeps abreast of all product updates, including software and application updates and releases, new partner offerings, market conditions, and competitor activities, i.e. updates to competitor software or new competitors in our core verticals
Participates in trade shows and conventions as required
All other duties as assigned





Skills & experience

Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or equivalent work experience
1-3 years of sales experience, in a closing role at a SaaS company with a stellar record of performance
Technical aptitude – strong understanding of API’s, SaaS, cloud computing etc.
Proficient level at Microsoft Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Publisher)
Exposure to the health & wellness industry either as an enthusiast or teacher
Knowledge of web technologies or web savvy
Good written and verbal communication skills
Good group presentation skills and ability to communicate effectively
Demonstrated career stability
Good attention to detail, extremely organized
Able to multi-task
Ability to consistently maintain attention and concentration for extended periods of time and function in a high stress environment, under substantial time pressure
Right to work in Singapore
